notes: Product search results page. Shows grid of product tiles with search query, filters, and pagination. URL format: /pt/pesquisa?q={query}

resultsContainer.name: Search results container
resultsContainer.notes: Main container for all product search results

resultsCount.name: Results count text
resultsCount.notes: Displays total number of results (e.g., '1,059 resultados para:')

productTile.name: Individual product card
productTile.reason: BEM naming with data attribute fallback
productTile.notes: Individual product card. Has data-pid attribute with unique product ID. This is the main container for each product in search results.

productId.name: Product ID attribute
productId.notes: Extract using element.getAttribute('data-pid'). Unique product identifier.

productName.name: Product name/title
productName.notes: Product name text within product tile

productImageContainer.name: Product image container
productImageContainer.notes: Container for product image and link to product detail page

productImage.name: Product image
productImage.notes: Product image element. Check alt and src attributes.

productLink.name: Link to product detail page
productLink.reason: Structural selector with URL pattern fallback
productLink.notes: Link to product detail page. URL format: /pt/alimentacao/.../product-slug/{pid}.html

productPrice.name: Product price
productPrice.notes: Product price text (e.g., '0,86 â‚¬'). Parse first line of textContent.

productRating.name: Product rating/reviews
productRating.notes: Product rating element (BazaarVoice integration). May not be present for all products.

productLabels.name: Product labels/badges
productLabels.notes: Container for promotional badges and labels (e.g., 'Produto Nacional')

productMeasures.name: Product unit/measure info
productMeasures.notes: Product unit information (e.g., '1L', '500g'). NOT VERIFIED with actual content.

productNotes.name: Product notes/description
productNotes.notes: Additional product notes or description. NOT VERIFIED.

productPromoBadges.name: Promotional badges
productPromoBadges.notes: Promotional badge container (discounts, offers, etc.). NOT VERIFIED.

productQuantitySelector.name: Quantity selector and add to cart controls
productQuantitySelector.notes: Container for quantity selection and add to cart button

addToCartButton.name: Add to cart button
addToCartButton.reason: JS hook class with BEM context
addToCartButton.notes: Add to cart button. May be disabled if product unavailable. Classes: auc-button__circle auc-js-add-to-cart

wishlistButton.name: Add to wishlist button
wishlistButton.reason: BEM naming with JS hook fallback
wishlistButton.notes: Add to wishlist button within product tile

unavailableIndicator.name: Out of stock indicator
unavailableIndicator.notes: Indicates product is out of stock. May be class modifier on tile or disabled button. NOT VERIFIED - no unavailable products found in test searches.

sortDropdown.name: Sort order dropdown
sortDropdown.notes: Dropdown to change sort order (price, name, etc.). NOT VERIFIED.

filterSection.name: Filter/refinement section
filterSection.notes: Left sidebar with category, price, brand filters. NOT VERIFIED.

addToCart.description: Add product to cart from search results
addToCart.notes: May trigger modal or inline confirmation. Check for cart count update.

productList.description: Extract all products from search results
